website_summaries.verdict: Owners rave about how easy this option is to install. A good fit for budget-conscious parents hoping to avoid complicated installation.
pros: Lightweight with grippy handle that makes carrying a little easier
Auto belt guides allow for use without a base
Impact absorbing foam boosts safety and improves comfort at the same time
Adjustable canopy keeps little ones protected from the elements
cons: We'd love to see more padding or inserts for newborn neck support

customer_reviews.title: but my little loves it so I'm highly satisfied. It's easy to carry and
customer_reviews.text: For sure need an infant insert, but my little loves it so I'm highly satisfied. It's easy to carry and install
customer_reviews.author: ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: For all intents and purposes this seat works. However for $20 more I could have gotten a much nicer seat with a higher weight limit and easier to use. This seat doesn't have a true lever/button to disconnect the seat from the base. When you do get it undone you have to tilt the seat so far forward that my son's head went flopping forward so hard I was scared we hurt him. There seems to be no padding whatsoever and the straps are difficult to adjust. You have to push a button on the back of the seat where the straps exit and pull each strap individually. Definitely would not reccomend this seat to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand why there are so many bad reviews.i really like it. Its lite to carry,straps are easy to adjust if you read the manual,and easy to attach and detach from the base. *money well spent :) might have to buy a head guard tho for a little more comfort.
customer_reviews.author: amazonfeen

customer_reviews.title: Cost is perfect! Nice compact infant seat
customer_reviews.text: This same exact car seat was $80 + in-stores. So I kept looking for a deal and finally came across this for half the price here on amazon. It’s very lightweight, perfect for an infant newborn to 1+ year old.
customer_reviews.author: MoniceSharde

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is light weight, much lighter than the one we bought for our first born. Easy install, easy to clip the seat onto the base and take off. Like the clean color.
customer_reviews.author: Lovefromoversea

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended if you're looking for just a car seat to bring baby home.
customer_reviews.text: Standard infant carseat. The material stays cool on baby's skin.
customer_reviews.author: AmzCusto

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Great car seat, easy to install and very easy to adjust. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: billy rogers

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: First of all the shade is missing a whole piece and it just hangs down. It's nearly impossible to take in and out of the car. Junk!

customer_reviews.title: LOOKS GOOD
customer_reviews.text: GOOD SIZE, A LITTLE TOO HEAVY EVEN WITHOUT THE BABY IN IT; HAD TO GET USED TO ADJUSTING THE STRAPS.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Solid car seat. Great price for something that won’t be used very long

customer_reviews.title: It’s cool.

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this seller
customer_reviews.text: Was fast with shipping and was just as shown in photo

customer_reviews.title: For bigger babies
customer_reviews.text: I'm not crazy about this carseat. We bought it for our other car. It's not for a newborn! The base isnt adjustable so her head flops forward in an unsafe way.

customer_reviews.title: Decent buy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect simple Car seat. A bit of a pain to take base out but putting in was easy.

customer_reviews.title: Not for newborns
customer_reviews.text: It has no backwards incline. It was marginally acceptable for my older baby, but it would not be okay for a smaller baby with no neck control.

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a friend that had a baby. She loved it said it was easy to install in her car.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Brock

customer_reviews.title: the seat is nice and light but it is SO difficult to take ...
customer_reviews.text: the shade is bigger than most, the seat is nice and light but it is SO difficult to take the seat out of it's base with a baby in it that you wake the baby up...and I have four kids, I know how to work a car seat. I really wanted this one to work, super unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I guess you get what you pay for.. ...
customer_reviews.text: I guess you get what you pay for... cheap product barely passes safety standards (the fire marshal told me so)

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Reliable, inexpensive, and comfy. Only issue is the sun shade is falling apart.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the $
customer_reviews.text: So far it seems like a good car seat for the price. The canopy is a little flimsy and it takes some practice getting the seat out of the base. This is my 4th evenflo seat and I trust the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Seat is pretty great. The only thing I don't like is ...
customer_reviews.text: Seat is pretty great. The only thing I don't like is when the seat clips into the base it makes a loud slapping noise which wakes my daughter sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Evenflo infant car seat
customer_reviews.text: It is just what we need for to transport the baby.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Lee

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: It's plastic enforced instead of steal and just overall pretty cheap. Probably works excellently in the event of a crash but I would be scared find out. Cute though, and still seats a newborn in a car, which is what matters.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Great product delivery was quick
customer_reviews.text: Product came as described. Very happy with my purchase. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ZERO STARS
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly dissatisfied! Received this carseat in April and here it is the end of May and I'm STILL having issues. I have received this carseat THREE times with NO base included. Amazon lists the base as included. So now I have 2 more LARGE boxes I have to drop off to UPS while 9 months pregnant with TWINS. Purchased the teal carseat(same brand and model, just a different design) and had no problem and base was included. Babies literally coming at any time and I have ONE carseat! 😒😒😒. The design is really cute and comes as described otherwise..but again, it DOES NOT come with a base from my personal experience.
customer_reviews.author: nscdwa9089

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love this car seat and the print. Lightweight and very easy to install. My babyboy fit in so perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: chylito

customer_reviews.text: I love the car seat but it didn't come with the shade piece

customer_reviews.text: just made with poor material, not enough padding and cushion. my daughter hated it. went out and got a Graco and she loves it

customer_reviews.text: Its was nice and cheap and not to hard to figure out

product_meta.title: Evenflo Nurture Infant Car Seat, Teal Confetti
product_meta.description: Specifically for infants - convenience for you and comfort for baby. The Evenflo Nurture Infant Car Seat provides comfort for your child and exclusive convenience for the ultimate value in child restraints. The Nurture Infant Car Seat features an ergonomically shaped handle for a more comfortable carry and a pivoting canopy, to shade your baby. This seat can be used rear-facing only for children weighing 5 - 22 pounds. This seat may be used with or without a base. Additional accessory bases available.
feature_bullets: Separate stay-in-the-car base allows for easy transfer from home to car via the ergonomic easy-to-carry handle; Also available separately
5-point harness with 3 shoulder harness and 2 crotch buckle positions for better fit and longer use
Auto belt guides for use without a base if preferred
Canopy shields baby from the elements. Top of child’s head is at least 1 in. below the top of the child restraint seat back and the car seat fits children with a height of 19-29 inches (48–74 cm)
Energy absorbing foam liner provides added safety and comfort

specifications.Care instructions: DO NOT lubricate or immerse in water any part of this child restraint, unless rinsing is permitted Plastic and metal parts may be wiped clean with mild soap and water and dried with a soft cloth. Do not use abrasive cleaners or solvents. Take care not to damage any labels. The harness can be wiped clean with mild soap and water. Allow harness to air dry. Machine wash the seat pad separately in cold water, delicate cycle. Tumble dry 10 to 15 minutes on low heat.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars160 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
